amendment.description: Amendment clarified that illegal immigrants shall be ineligible for financial assistance under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 110-621 to clarify that illegal immigrants shall be ineligible for financial assistance under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Altmire amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 391 - 33 (Roll no. 297).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Altmire.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Altmire amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 391 - 33 (Roll no. 297).
